txt.en: After unlocking new skills, be sure to go to the Skills Panel and place them on one of your quickslot bars, if they have not been automatically placed. As you gain more Destiny Points, you can use them to purchase additional skill upgrades, and your skills will increase in power with you.

After unlocking new skills, be sure to go to the Skills panel and place them on one of your quickslot bars, if they have not been automatically placed. As you gain more Commendations, you can use them to purchase additional skill upgrades, and your skills will increase in power with you.

To use the skills that you have trained, they must be assigned to your quickslot bars. This is done automatically if you have open slots on your bars. Your skill list is located in your character sheet and can be accessed directly with the \qK\q key.

To use the skills that you have trained, they must be assigned to your quickslot bars. This is done automatically if you have open slots on your bars. Your Skill panel can be accessed via a button in your Character Panel or can be opened directly with the 'K' key. If you accidentally remove a skill from one of your bars, go to your Character Panel and drag the skill onto an empty slot.
